Missing HttpOnly Cookie Attribute HTTP.title: Missing HttpOnly Cookie Attribute
Missing HttpOnly Cookie Attribute HTTP.recommended_correction_script:
sudo sed -i '/</web-app>/i \
    
    <session-config>
        <cookie-config>
            <http-only>true</http-only>
        </cookie-config>
    </session-config>
' \
    /usr/src/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml

 sudo systemctl restart tomcat

openvas_reports.Summary:
The remote HTTP web server / application is missing to set the
  'HttpOnly' cookie attribute for one or more sent HTTP cookie.
openvas_reports.Solution_OpenVAS:
'- Set the 'HttpOnly' cookie attribute for any session cookie

  - Evaluate / do an own assessment of the security impact on the web server / application and create
  an override for this result if there is none (this can't be checked automatically by this VT)
